p: Looking further back, SIV cpz itself was also generated by lentiviral host switching and recombination. Based on the SIV sequences available at the time, early studies identified SIV mon/-mus/-gsn (which infect mona, mustached, and greater spot-nosed monkeys, respectively) and SIV rcm (which infects red-capped mangabeys) as probable donors [ 12]. Functional analysis of accessory genes from these putative parental lineages indicate that the specific donors and genomic locations of these recombination event(s) were crucial for enabling what became SIV cpz to cross the high species barrier and establish an endemic lineage in hominids [ 13].
